answers.answer: Here's a site that mentions fatigue:http://www.liverkids.org.au/fgilbert.htmHere's another:http://www.gilbertsweb.co.uk/whatisgs.htmandhttp://www.gilbertsweb.co.uk/doctors/whatisgs.htmYou should check out Gilberts Web (Homepage)Lots of information about Gilberts Syndrome,(including a messageboard):http://www.gilbertsweb.co.uk/index.html

I was also diagnosed with Gilberts Syndrome and I find that I have frequent symptoms but I was also wondering if it can relate to diabetes.  It runs in my family and my docter told me I should get checked every year.  Does Diabetes and Gilberts Syndrome have some kind of relation?Amber

question: I was just diagnosed with Gilberts Syndrome.  My doctor doesn't say that this is related with fatigue.  I wanted to find out if it is related to fatigue.  I have read many stories on the internet of people with Gilberts Syndrome that experience fatigue and weakness.  Thanks for your time.
title: gilberts syndrome
